title: Cold Caller – Real Estate Investment (Remote, EST Hours)
job_overview:
Cold Caller – Real Estate Investment (Remote, EST Hours)
Break into the most impactful niche in real estate. Change lives. Build wealth. Cold call with purpose.

About the Opportunity

This is not your typical cold calling job.

We're a fast-growing real estate investment company helping homeowners going through foreclosure or distress. Every call you make has the potential to truly help someone — while building a path to high commissions and long-term growth.

We’re looking for a fluent English speaker with real sales experience, natural empathy, and the drive to become a top 1% closer.

If you’ve got the voice, the heart, and the ambition — we’ve got the training, leads, and opportunity.


Schedule

Full-time: 8am–5pm EST

Part-time options available (minimum 5 hours/day, must overlap EST)


Compensation

Base pay + performance bonuses

Bonuses for:

Every qualified appointment set

Every deal closed from your call

Ongoing raises for consistent performers

Access to our exclusive industry mastermind (used by 7-figure investors)


What You’ll Do

Call homeowners directly from our pre-qualified lists

Build real conversations — no robotic script reading

Identify pain points, listen with empathy, and offer help

Set up appointments for our acquisitions team to make offers

Use CRM daily to track outcomes, notes, and follow-ups


Requirements

Fluent English speaker (clear, confident, warm voice)

Sales experience is required (cold calling preferred)

Genuine empathy — this is about people, not pressure

Consistent, reliable, coachable, and relentless

Strong internet connection, quiet workspace, and quality headset


Why Join Us

Real opportunity to make $2K–$6K/month or more

Be part of a mission-driven team that helps people every day

Grow in one of the most fulfilling, recession-proof niches in real estate

You’ll learn from top closers, scripts, and strategy

Weekly training + personal sales coaching


Apply Now

Click Apply and include a 30-second voice note introducing yourself and sharing why you're interested in this role.

We’re hiring now, and we're only bringing on the top 1% who want to win with us.
